examples.korean: It is based on the real life of Hercule-Savinien de Cyrano de Bergerac (1619-1655), a French dramatist and duelist. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 작품은 프랑스 극작가이며 검술 결투자였던 에르퀼 사비니앵 시라노 드 베르주라크 (1619년-1655년)의 실제 삶을 토대로 구성되었다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: It is based on the real life of Hercule-Savinien de Cyrano de Bergerac (1619-1655), a French dramatist and duelist. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: "The Warrior, Baek Dong-soo" features Baek Dong-soo’s heroic activities as Joseon Dynasty’s best warrior, and shows the warrior’s combat skills such as martial arts, swordmanship, and spearmanship. 듣기 Add to Wordbook "무사, 백동수"는 조선시대 최고 무사로서의 영웅적 활약을 주제로 그리고 있으며, 무사의 무술, 창술, 그리고 검술과 같은 전투 기술을 보여준다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: "The Warrior, Baek Dong-soo" features Baek Dong-soo’s heroic activities as Joseon Dynasty’s best warrior, and shows the warrior’s combat skills such as martial arts, swordmanship, and spearmanship. Add to Wordbook
